comment:
* This class reports the readiness of the updatable code to be used.
 * @hide

methods.name: public static boolean shouldStartUpdatableService()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the updatable service (part of mainline) is ready to be used. * Otherwise the platform shell service should be started. * *

see {@code com.android.providers.settings.DeviceConfigService} *

see {@code android.provider.DeviceConfig} * * @return true if the updatable code should be used
